name: Astrophobia (Ghost Potato)
description:
Sound effects and movement done by Banan

Sprites and other coding done by Me

Story:
Being a little astronaut through the depths of space must be terrifying especially while avoiding asteroids, enemy space ships and flying metal scraps. Can you make it back to the safety of the ship?

Controls:

wasd or arrow keys to turn and space to boost DONT HIT SPACESHIP PLS they are to keep you in bounds
